ServerClientPacket - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.CommunicationProtocol.ServerClient.Packets
The ServerClientPacket interface represents packets sent from the server to the client.
It implements the Command pattern and declares the execute method that the client will run after receiving the packet to allow it to update the appropriate classes/attributes in the model/view of the client.

SynchronousGameState - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States
Represents a synchronous state in the game where actions are performed by players in a turn-based manner.
This abstract class extends GameState and provides functionality for managing player turns.
